pullrequest.title: [Blueprint] Service to add performers at runtime

content.raw: This will affect distributed simulation, which currently assumes that all performers are known at startup. This assumption is changing soon with the updates I'm making to be able to transplant performers though, so I think we can keep spawned performers out of distributed sim until then.
content.html: This will affect distributed simulation, which currently assumes that all performers are known at startup. This assumption is changing soon with the updates I'm making to be able to transplant performers though, so I think we can keep spawned performers out of distributed sim until then.
